body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Due to #26275 I am unable to build openmpi against the Broadwell arch, but using an external openmpi causes the ITK build to fail (though nothing to do with Broadwell/Skylake in this case as I'm not specifying the target arch). I am quite unsure this issue hasn't been reported in a different guise for some other package combination.

```console
$ spack external find --scope=site openmpi
==> The following specs have been detected on this system and added to /projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/etc/spack/packages.yaml
-- no arch / gcc@9.3.0 ------------------------------------------
openmpi@4.0.3
$ cat etc/spack/packages.yaml
packages:
  openmpi:
    externals:
    - spec: openmpi@4.0.3%gcc@9.3.0~cuda+cxx~cxx_exceptions+java~memchecker+pmi~sqlite3~static~thread_multiple~wrapper-rpath
        fabrics=ofi,psm,psm2 schedulers=slurm
      prefix: /usr
$ spack install itk
 ...
==> itk: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

7 errors found in build log:
     2225    [ 28%] Building C object Modules/ThirdParty/MINC/src/libminc/CMakeFiles/itkminc2.dir/lib
             src2/dimension.c.o
     2226    cd /tmp/micedev/spack-stage/spack-stage-itk-5.2.1-5jtd7nz3zgf67ixbbdlnyqd4c2eluvox/spack
             -build-5jtd7nz/Modules/ThirdParty/MINC/src/libminc && /projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20
             .04/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DH5_BUILT_AS_DYNAMIC_LIB -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DMINC2=1 -D_F
             ILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE -D_LARGEFILE_SOURCE -D_POSIX_C_SO
             URCE=200809L -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500 -Ditkminc2_EXPORTS -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20
             .04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/fftw-3.3.9-ya3kly5vvdexgjwwkdov7
             glaeausortv/include -I/tmp/micedev/spack-stage/spack-stage-itk-5.2.1-5jtd7nz3zgf67ixbbdl

             67ixbbdlnyqd4c2eluvox/spack-build-5jtd7nz/Modules/ThirdParty/MINC -I/tmp/micedev/spack-s
             tage/spack-stage-itk-5.2.1-5jtd7nz3zgf67ixbbdlnyqd4c2eluvox/spack-src/Modules/ThirdParty
```
